name: Bind Multiple Volumes to LXC
description:
Binds multiple host directories to an LXC container.

For each volume entry (key=value format, one per line), creates a bind mount from <host_path>/<key> to /<value> in the container.

This template can be called independently of the LXC container's state (running or stopped) and is safe to call multiple times (idempotent).

parameters.name: ID of the LXC Container
parameters.description: ID of the LXC container to which the volumes will be bound.

parameters.name: Host Path Base
parameters.description: Base path on the Proxmox host. Volume directories will be created at <host_path>/<volume-key>.

parameters.name: Volumes
parameters.description:
Volume mappings in key=value format, one per line. Each line creates a bind mount from <host_path>/<key> to /<value> in the container. Example:
volume1=/var/lib/myapp/data
volume2=/var/lib/myapp/logs

commands.description: Executes the script to bind multiple volumes in the container.
